root: ^The Brightcandle Inn seems more like an infirmary than the merry establishments back in Lumis. Drinks are scarce, but it wouldn't be too hard to find a quiet place to rest here for even a few hours.

c-2: ^You wake after a short but much needed rest.

illusionist: ^Ah, there you are. I have packed my belongings and am ready to head out. Sooner rather than later - my trail is still hot and the assassin could very well still be out there.
bar: ^As you approach the bar, your eyes are drawn to a man dressed in fine clothes, which drape over his frame in a way that suggests an effortless elegance. Even hunched over the bar, he exudes charisma and poise that sets him apart.
converse: ^You could say so, friend. I barely escaped an assassination attempt on my life and need to get out of town.

^The man takes a sip from his glass and looks over at you. "You don't seem like you belong here either," he says. "I could use some new allies, maybe my services could help you as we leave this place?"

c-8: ^I offer two services. First, I can help you safely store a basic version of any card for you to retrieve later. My vault can hold up to 4 cards. However, if you want to add a new card after the 4th, you'll have to remove one first.
^Or I can use my talents to create a perfect copy of a single card. The choice is yours, [[class]].

services: ^Certainly, do you require my particular skills, [[class]]?
